segments.text: You know , smoking does do harm to your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you try to give it up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've tried to give up smoking several times , but it's no good . Smoking relaxes me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever thought of just cutting down ? You could do it gradually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , maybe I should have another try .
segments.speaker: S2
